001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service;
002
003import com.google.gson.Gson;
004import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Game;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Guess;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Ranking;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
009import java.util.List;
010import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
011import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
012import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level;
013import retrofit2.Call;
014import retrofit2.Retrofit;
015import retrofit2.adapter.rxjava3.RxJava3CallAdapterFactory;
016import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;
017import retrofit2.http.Body;
018import retrofit2.http.GET;
019import retrofit2.http.Header;
020import retrofit2.http.POST;
021import retrofit2.http.Path;
022import retrofit2.http.Query;
023
024public interface CodebreakerServiceProxy {
025
026  @POST("games")
027  Single<Game> startGame(
028      @Body Game game,
029      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
030
031  @GET("games/{id}")
032  Single<Game> getGame(
033      @Path("id") String id,
034      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
035
036  @POST("games/{id}/guesses")
037  Single<Guess> submitGuess(
038      @Path("id") String gameId,
039      @Body Guess guess,
040      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
041
042  @GET("rankings")
043  Single<List<Ranking>> getRankings(
044      @Query("pool-size") int poolSize,
045      @Query("code-length") int codelength,
046      @Query("games-threshold") int gamesThreshold,
047      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
048}
